data.title: El Salvador prepares to launch Bitcoin "volcano bond" as they face mounting debt
data.text: Six months after El Salvador became the first nation to make bitcoin legal currency, El Salvador's president Nayib Bukele is preparing to launch a controversial Bitcoin “volcano bond”, as early as this week.  The 10-year estimated $1 billion volcano bond is part of El Salvador's plan to change the way the country relies on energy, as well as a way to increase the Latin American nation's to increase the country's bitcoin stocks and to finance a new “bitcoin city” powered by geothermal energy.
